sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Checkout from '../components/Checkout' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) //Price calculation cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0 ) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 500 ? 50 : 100 cart.taxPrice = Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('order') } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.state}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x Rs. {item.price} = Rs. {item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items Rs.{cart.itemsPrice} Shipping Rs.{cart.shippingPrice} Tax Rs.{cart.taxPrice} Total Rs.{cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
